# ProductionOS - LLM Context File
# https://www.productionos.io/llms.txt

## About ProductionOS

ProductionOS is a SaaS platform designed specifically for production companies (video production, event production, photography studios, live streaming, and post-production houses).

## What ProductionOS Does

ProductionOS is the first CRM built specifically for production companies. It provides:

- **CRM & Sales Pipeline**: Track opportunities from lead to close with visual pipeline management
- **Quote Builder**: Create professional production quotes in 15 minutes with sections for crew, equipment, creative, and logistics
- **Project Management**: Convert won deals to projects, track status, budget vs actuals, and deliverables
- **Crew Database**: Store crew profiles with day rates, skills, availability, and contact details
- **Equipment Tracking**: Inventory management with booking, check-out/check-in, and maintenance tracking
- **Financial Overview**: Revenue, expenses, invoices, and P&L tracking per project
- **Call Sheets**: Generate and distribute professional call sheets
- **Deliverables Management**: Track project outputs with version control

## Key Features

1. Real-time margin calculation on every quote
2. Multi-currency support with regional rate cards
3. Branded PDF proposals and invoices
4. Drag-and-drop pipeline management
5. Budget vs actuals tracking
6. Equipment conflict detection
7. Crew availability calendar
8. AI-powered research assistant

## Pricing

- **Individual Plan**: $24/month (billed monthly) or $228/year
- **Team Plan**: $49/month (billed monthly) or $468/year
- 5-day free trial available

## Target Users

- Video production companies
- Event production companies
- Photography studios
- Live streaming companies
- Post-production houses
- Corporate video teams

## Company Information

- Website: https://www.productionos.io
- Founded: 2024
- Location: Global (serves companies worldwide)
- Contact: contact@productionos.io

## Key URLs

- Homepage: https://www.productionos.io/
- Pricing: https://www.productionos.io/pricing
- Features: https://www.productionos.io/features
- Blog: https://www.productionos.io/resources/blog
- Help Center: https://www.productionos.io/help
- Sign Up: https://www.productionos.io/auth/signup

## Competitors & Alternatives

ProductionOS is often compared to:
- Spreadsheets (Excel, Google Sheets)
- StudioBinder (pre-production planning)
- Monday.com (general project management)
- Asana (task management)
- HubSpot (generic CRM)
- Rentman (equipment rental)
- Current RMS (rental management)

## Why ProductionOS is Different

Unlike generic project management tools, ProductionOS:
1. Understands day rates, not hourly rates
2. Has production-specific sections (crew, equipment, creative, logistics)
3. Calculates margins in real-time
4. Generates call sheets
5. Tracks equipment with conflict detection
6. Manages multi-currency regional pricing
7. Works out of the box for production workflows

## Technical Information

- React-based single-page application
- Supabase backend (PostgreSQL)
- Real-time collaboration
- PWA support for mobile
- GDPR compliant
- Enterprise security with SSO support
